Text: Episode 4466:  It was accompanied by a special, one-off BBC Red Button episode called "Billy's Olympic Nightmare".

Text: Episode 4466:  The episode received an "All About Soap" award nomination for Best Episode, under the name "Billy and the Olympic Torch", and a British Soap Award nomination for "Spectacular Scene of the Year", both in 2013.
